data.lyric:
[ti:The Lucky One (Taylor’s Version)]
[ar:Taylor Swift]
[al:Red (Taylor's Version)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.43]The Lucky One (Taylor’s Version) - Taylor Swift
[00:01.87]Lyrics by：Taylor Swift
[00:02.51]Composed by：Taylor Swift
[00:03.30]
[00:13.17]New to town with a made up name
[00:16.16]In the angel's city chasing fortune and fame
[00:20.25]And the camera flashes make it look like a dream
[00:26.21]
[00:29.15]You had it figured out since you were in school
[00:32.45]Everybody loves pretty everybody loves cool
[00:36.29]
[00:36.83]So overnight you look like a sixties queen
[00:42.32]
[00:44.34]Another name goes up in lights
[00:48.93]Like diamonds in the sky
[00:53.23]And they'll tell you now you're the lucky one
[00:57.13]Yeah they'll tell you now you're the lucky one
[01:00.92]But can you tell me now you're the lucky one
[01:05.26]Oh oh oh
[01:09.82]
[01:12.98]Now it's big black cars and Riviera views
[01:17.02]And your lover in the foyer doesn't even know you
[01:21.21]And your secrets end up splashed on the news front page
[01:27.51]
[01:29.46]And they tell you that you're lucky but you're so confused
[01:33.47]'Cause you don't feel pretty you just feel used
[01:37.83]And all the young things line up to take your place
[01:43.63]
[01:45.37]Another name goes up in lights
[01:49.02]You wonder if you'll make it out alive
[01:54.21]And they'll tell you now you're the lucky one
[01:57.61]
[01:58.11]Yeah they'll tell you now you're the lucky one
[02:02.23]Can you tell me now you're the lucky one
[02:06.40]Oh oh oh
[02:15.04]Oh oh oh
[02:25.16]
[02:30.05]It was a few years later I showed up here
[02:34.55]And they still tell the legend of how you disappeared
[02:38.73]How you took the money and your dignity and got the hell out
[02:44.02]
[02:47.45]They say you bought a bunch of land somewhere
[02:50.78]Chose the rose garden over Madison Square
[02:55.03]And it took some time but I understand it now
[03:00.98]
[03:02.73]'Cause now my name is up in lights
[03:06.46]
[03:07.22]But I think you got it right
[03:11.31]Let me tell you now you're the lucky one
[03:15.42]Let me tell you now you're the lucky one
[03:19.39]Let me tell you now you're the lucky one oh oh oh
[03:27.60]Yeah they'll tell you now you're the lucky one
[03:31.53]Yeah they'll tell you now you're the lucky one
[03:35.68]Let me tell you now you're the lucky one oh oh oh
[03:44.89]
[03:46.15]Oh whoa oh oh
data.trans:
[ti:The Lucky One (Taylor’s Version)]
[ar:Taylor Swift]
[al:Red (Taylor's Version)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.43]腾讯音乐享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:01.87]//
[00:02.51]//
[00:03.30]
[00:13.17]带着艺名初来乍到这里
[00:16.16]在洛杉矶这座天使之城 人人都追名逐利
[00:20.25]相机闪灯让这一切看起来像是梦
[00:26.21]
[00:29.15]你在学生时期就知道自己的方向
[00:32.45]每个人都爱美丽 每个人都追寻潮流
[00:36.29]
[00:36.83]于是一夜之间 你就像是个六零年代的皇后
[00:42.32]
[00:44.34]又一个陌生的名字爆红了
[00:48.93]就像闪耀于天际的钻石一般
[00:53.23]人们会说 你真是幸运
[00:57.13]是的 人们会说 你真是幸运
[01:00.92]但是你能告诉我 你真是幸运的么
[01:05.26]//
[01:09.82]
[01:12.98]乘着黑色礼车 住在海景套房
[01:17.02]你那坐在大厅里的爱人也不见得了解你
[01:21.21]而你的秘密却出现在各大报纸的头条
[01:27.51]
[01:29.46]人们会说 你真是幸运 但你很疑惑
[01:33.47]因为你感觉并不好 只觉精疲力竭
[01:37.83]长江后浪推前浪
[01:43.63]
[01:45.37]又一个陌生的名字爆红了
[01:49.02]你好奇自己能不能杀出重围
[01:54.21]人们会说 你真是幸运
[01:57.61]
[01:58.11]是的 人们会说 你真是幸运
[02:02.23]但是你能告诉我 你真是幸运的么
[02:06.40]//
[02:15.04]//
[02:25.16]
[02:30.05]几年过后我来到这个地方
[02:34.55]人们仍然谈论着你消失在萤光幕的传奇事跡
[02:38.73]你是如何带着财富跟尊严离开那个鬼地方
[02:44.02]
[02:47.45]人们说你在某处买了一大块地
[02:50.78]你选择了玫瑰花园 放弃了麦迪逊广场
[02:55.03]虽然花了点时间 但我现在能了解
[03:00.98]
[03:02.73]因为现在我的名字也成为注目焦点
[03:06.46]
[03:07.22]但我想你是对的
[03:11.31]现在让我告诉你 你真是幸运
[03:15.42]现在让我告诉你 你真是幸运
[03:19.39]现在让我告诉你 你真是幸运  
[03:27.60]是的 人们会说 你真是幸运
[03:31.53]是的 人们会说 你真是幸运
[03:35.68]现在让我告诉你 你真是幸运  
[03:44.89]
[03:46.15]//
